## Part 1

### Question 1

```{r}
midwest |>
  group_by(state) |>
  summarise(num_counties = n()) |>
  arrange(desc(num_counties))
```

Illinois (IL) has the most amount of counties at 102.
Wisconsin (WI) has the least amount of counties at 72.
